Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Makes certain not-for-profit corporations subject to the freedom of information and open meetings laws
Summary: Makes certain not-for-profit corporations subject to the freedom of information and open meetings laws.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to making certain not-for-profit corporations subject to the freedom of information and open meetings laws
